sentences.english: A beam of sunlight shone into the lush green forest.
sentences.chinese: 一縷陽光照進了蒼鬱的森林。

sentences.english: " Ningxiang garden" near the cemetery He Yingrui Cooper verdant forest, towering.
sentences.chinese: “凝香園”附近的何應瑞墓地古柏成林，蒼鬱參天。

sentences.english: Someday you will walk into a deep wood.
sentences.chinese: 獨自走進一座蒼鬱的森林。
